name: @bcgov/citz-imb-richtexteditor
description: BCGov Rich Text Editor for React
author: Brady Mitchell <braden.mitchell@gov.bc.ca>

scripts.bundle:dts: node bundle-dts.js && rollup -c rollup.config.js && node remove-dts.js && rm build/utils/*.d.ts && rm build/assets/*.d.ts
scripts.build:cp: cp src/styles.css build/styles.css && cp src/assets/*.svg build/assets
scripts.build: rm -rf build && tsc && npm run bundle:dts && rm tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && npm run build:cp
scripts.pack: npm i && npm run build && npm cache clean --force && npm pack && mkdir releases && mv *.tgz ./releases/
